data.quote: Success is something you attract by the person you become

data.quote: Argue for your limitations and they're yours.

data.quote: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.

data.author: Benjamin Franklin

data.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

data.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.

data.quote: Life isn't about getting and having, it's about giving and being.

data.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.

data.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.

data.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.

data.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.

data.quote: Miracles are not contrary to nature, but only contrary to what we know about nature.

data.quote: If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.

data.quote: We often repent of our first thoughts, and scarce ever of our second.
data.author: Horace Walpole

data.quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.

data.quote: Bald as the bare mountain tops are bald, with a baldness full of grandeur.

data.quote: People change and forget to tell each other.

data.quote: If you are afraid of being lonely, don't try to be right.

data.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

data.quote: Nature is not human hearted.

data.quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination.

data.quote: If you don't know where you're going, you will probably end up somewhere else.

data.quote: Love does not alter the beloved, it alters itself.

data.quote: The more you talk about negative things in your life, the more you call them in. Speak victory not defeat.

data.quote: I make mistakes; I'll be the second to admit it.

data.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

data.quote: Art is a harmony parallel with nature.

data.quote: There can be no deep disappointment where there is not deep love.

data.quote: Passion is more developed than discovered.

data.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.

data.quote: Pick a flower on Earth and you move the farthest star.

data.quote: All our dreams can come true-if we have the courage to pursue them.

data.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

data.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.

data.quote: I am always doing that which I cannot do, in order that I may learn how to do it.

data.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.

data.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.

data.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.

data.quote: This is the first test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible value to him.

data.quote: It is our choices . . . that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

data.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.

data.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.

data.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.

data.quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.

data.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

data.quote: The only foolproof path to wealth is inheritance.

data.author: Josh Billings

data.quote: To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.

data.quote: There is more hunger for love and appreciation in this world than for bread.

data.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.

data.quote: My favorite machine at the gym is the vending machine.

data.quote: Love me when I least deserve it, because that's when I really need it.

data.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning how to sail my ship.

data.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen nor even touched, but just felt in the heart.

data.quote: We need not think alike to love alike.

data.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance-waiting for the bathroom.

data.quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.

data.quote: Never argue with stupid people, they will drag you down to their level and then beat you with experience.

data.quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.

data.quote: Challenge yourself with something you know you could never do, and what you'll find is that you can overcome anything.

data.quote: My opinions may have changed, but not the fact that I am right.
data.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

data.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
data.author: Indira Gandhi

data.quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
data.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

data.quote: The madness of love is the greatest of heaven's blessings.

data.quote: It takes a great deal of courage to stand up to your enemies, but even more to stand up to your friends.
